#include <iostream>
#include <string>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	int t;
	string in;
	cin >> t;
	for (int c = 0; c < t; ++c) {
		cin >> in;
		int count = 0;
		for (int i = 0; i < in.length(); ++i) {
			char cur = in[i];
			switch (cur) {
			case 'A':
			case 'D':
			case 'O':
			case 'P':
			case 'Q':
			case 'R':
				++count;
				break;
			case 'B':
				count += 2;
			}
		}
		cout << count << endl;
	}

	return 0;
}
